snippet: The way the residents of Nutley, N.J., speak of Roche’s recently announced departure suggests they view it less like an international corporate giant and more like a friendly mom-and-pop shop.
abstract: Nutley Journal; residents of Nutley, NJ, express dismay over news that Roche, a global pharmaceutical company that has maintained facilities and provided jobs in the town since 1929, will be leaving; Roche says it will shut down its Nutley site by the end of 2013 to cut costs; move will put about 1,000 employees out of work.
lead_paragraph: The way the residents of Nutley, N.J., speak of Roche’s recently announced departure suggests they view it less like an international corporate giant and more like a friendly mom-and-pop shop.

headline.seo: Saddened Town Recalls History With Drug Giant Roche
headline.main: Saddened Town Recalls History With Drug Giant
headline.print_headline: Saddened Town Recalls History With Drug Giant
